collection.name: collection
collection.description:
Namespace for umobile collection implementations.
Houses the Module collection implementation.

model.name: model
model.description:
Namespace for umobile model implementations.
Houses the Credential, Module and State model
implementations.

auth.name: auth
auth.description: Namespace for the umobile authentication implementation.

session.name: session
session.description: Namespace for the umobile session implementation.

storage.name: storage
storage.description: Namespace for the umobile storage implementation.

view.name: view
view.description:
Namespace for umobile view implementations.
Houses the App, Credential and Module view
implementations.

umobile.name: umobile
umobile.description:
Main module for the umobile application. Namespaces
all source logic to the umobile namespace. Houses the
app, bootstrap, model, collection, view, auth and storage
submodules.

app.name: app
app.description: Namespace for running instance of the umobile application.

collection.ModuleCollection.name: collection.ModuleCollection
collection.ModuleCollection.description: The Module collection houses a collection of modules or portlets.

model.Credential.name: model.Credential
model.Credential.description:
The Credential model houses information relating to a user's
login credentials.

model.Module.name: model.Module
model.Module.description:
The Module model houses information relating to each
module or portlet.

model.State.name: model.State
model.State.description: The State model houses the state of a user's authentication status.

auth.Authentication.name: auth.Authentication
auth.Authentication.description: Manages authentication process for the umobile application.

session.SessionTracker.name: session.SessionTracker
session.SessionTracker.description: Gets and sets the last accessed timestamp for the current session.

session.SessionTrackerMock.name: session.SessionTrackerMock
session.SessionTrackerMock.description:
The SesssionTrackerMock class mocks the in-memory
implementation of the SessionTracking class.

storage.Storage.name: storage.Storage
storage.Storage.description: Manages persistence of data for the umobile application.

storage.Local.name: storage.Local
storage.Local.description: Manages the persistance of data to local storage.

storage.DB.name: storage.DB
storage.DB.description: Manages the persistance of data to the umobile database.

view.Module.name: view.Module
view.Module.description: Manages the individual Module or portlet view.

app.Bootstrap.name: app.Bootstrap
app.Bootstrap.description: Manages the bootstrap process for the umobile application.

classitems.description: The model class contained by the collection.
classitems.name: model

classitems.description:
Method overrides Backbone.save. Makes an update call to the
umobile.storage.sync method.
classitems.name: save

classitems.description:
Method overrides Backbone.fetch. Makes a read call to the
umobile.storage.sync method.
classitems.name: fetch

classitems.description:
Method overrides Backbone.sync with umobile.storage.sync method.
Persists the state of the model to the server.
classitems.name: sync

classitems.description: Entry point for the ModuleCollection.
classitems.name: initialize

classitems.description: The defaults hash is used to specify the default attributes.
classitems.name: defaults

classitems.description:
Method overrides Backbone.sync with umobile.storage.sync method.
Persists the state of the model to the server.
classitems.name: sync

classitems.description: The defaults hash is used to specify the default attributes.
classitems.name: defaults

classitems.description:
Method overrides Backbone.sync with umobile.storage.sync method.
Persists the state of the model to the server.
classitems.name: sync

classitems.description: The defaults hash is used to specify the default attributes.
classitems.name: defaults

classitems.description:
Method overrides Backbone.sync with umobile.storage.sync method.
Persists the state of the model to the server.
classitems.name: sync

classitems.description: Method returns local login servlet url.
classitems.name: getLocalLoginServletUrl

classitems.description: Method returns local logout servlet url.
classitems.name: getLocalLoginServletUrl

classitems.description:
Method logs a user into the system with the configured login
function. Data pertaining to a user and thier layout is made
available when successful.
classitems.name: getSession

classitems.description: Method stores user credentials in local storage.
classitems.name: storeCredentials

classitems.description: Method retrieves user credentials from local storage.
classitems.name: retrieveCredentials

classitems.description: Method mocks the login process for development purposes.
classitems.name: mockLogin

classitems.description:
Method performs authentication through the uMobile application server
local authentication controller.
classitems.name: localLogin

classitems.description: Method performs CAS authentication.
classitems.name: casLogin

classitems.description:
Method logs the current user out of the application and attempts
to reauthenticate based upon the given credentials parameter.
classitems.name: switchuser

classitems.description:
Method overrides Backbone.sync implementation
to persist application data.
classitems.name: sync

classitems.description: Root DOM element.
classitems.name: el

classitems.description: Object hash of valid DOM selectors.
classitems.name: selectors

classitems.description: Collection of modules.
classitems.name: moduleCollection

classitems.description: Credential model. Represents user credential state.
classitems.name: credModel

classitems.description: State model. Represents user state.
classitems.name: stateModel

classitems.description:
Helper method. Given the passed property, this method
parses the selector object looking for a match.
classitems.name: loc

classitems.description:
Method is triggered whenever a user's credentials
are updated. When triggered, this method directs
users to the home screen and makes a request to
retrieve layout data for the updated credentials.
classitems.name: onUpdateCredentials

classitems.description:
Method directs user to the current view when a user is unauthenticated
and the current view is not the home screen.
classitems.name: directToCurrentView

classitems.description: Renders the preferences view.
classitems.name: renderPreferences

classitems.description: Renders the footer on the home screen.
classitems.name: renderFooter

classitems.description: Render modules or portlets to the UI.
classitems.name: renderModules

classitems.description: Renders the UI for the App view.
classitems.name: render

classitems.description: Updates the UI with the selected module or portlet.
classitems.name: updateModuleView

classitems.description:
Entry point for the App view.
Initialize is called when the view is first created.
classitems.name: initialize

classitems.description: HTML tag name used to build a Credential view.
classitems.name: tagName

classitems.description:
Class name that is added to the tagName
when building a Credential view.
classitems.name: className

classitems.description:
Object hash of valid DOM selectors for
the Credential view.
classitems.name: selectors

classitems.description: Template for the Credential view.
classitems.name: template

classitems.description: Backbone events object.
classitems.name: events

classitems.description: Credential model. Represents user credential state.
classitems.name: credModel

classitems.description:
Method extracts credentials from the login form
and attempts to persist them by calling save on
the Credential model. Triggers a change event
on the Credential model.
classitems.name: updateCredentials

classitems.description:
Method clears the username and password input fields on the
login form and persists null values for the username and password
on the Credential model. Triggers a change event on the Credential model.
classitems.name: logout

classitems.description: Handler for the logout button on the Credential view.
classitems.name: logoutHandler

classitems.description: Handler for the update button on the Credential view.
classitems.name: submitHandler

classitems.description:
Helper method. Given the passed property, this method
parses the selector object looking for a match.
classitems.name: loc

classitems.description: Method renders the UI for the Credential view.
classitems.name: render

classitems.description:
Entry point for the Credential view.
Method is called when the view is first created.
classitems.name: initialize

classitems.description: HTML tag name used to build a Module view.
classitems.name: tagName

classitems.description:
Class name that is added to the tagName
when building a Module view.
classitems.name: className

classitems.description:
Object hash of valid DOM selectors for
the Module view.
classitems.name: selectors

classitems.description: Template for the Module view.
classitems.name: template

classitems.description: Model for the Module view.
classitems.name: moduleModel

classitems.description: Backbone events object.
classitems.name: events

classitems.description: Click handler for the portlet icon.
classitems.name: showModuleClickHander

classitems.description:
Helper method. Given the passed property, this method
parses the selector object looking for a match.
classitems.name: loc

classitems.description: Method renders the UI for the Module view.
classitems.name: render

classitems.description:
Entry point for the Module view.
Method is called when the view is first created.
classitems.name: initialize

classitems.description: Method searches the URL for the given name argument.
classitems.name: getUrlParam

params.name: name
params.description: Parameter to search for on the URL.

classitems.description:
Property stores reference to umobile.app, which houses the
running instance of the umobile application.
classitems.name: app

classitems.description:
Method parses the data received by the session.retrieved event.
Iterates over layout JSON and adds modules (i.e. portlets) to
the ModuleCollection based upon the number of portlets described
by the JSON feed.
classitems.name: buildModuleCollection

params.name: data
params.description: Object containing layout and portlet information.

classitems.description:
Success handler for the Credential request. Method checks the backend session
access tracker. If the session tracker is non-zero, this method updates the application
state with the value from the session tracker. This method also checks the application
state for the last session access timestamp. If a timestamp is present and is within
session length, this method assumes a valid session and skips authentication. Otherwise,
the authentication process is started.
classitems.name: credSuccessHandler

classitems.description: Generic error handler for failed requests.
classitems.name: errorHandler

classitems.description:
When triggered, method renders a loader to end users,
initializes the main application view and starts the
data retrieval process.
classitems.name: onDeviceReady

classitems.description:
Method sets up listeners for the umobile applicaiton during the bootstrap
process. The application is currently set up to listen for the deviceready
event and a custom session.retrieved event.
classitems.name: initEventListener

classitems.description:
Method initializes the State and Credential models as well as
the Module collection during the bootstrap phase.
classitems.name: initModels

classitems.description:
Entry point for the umobile application.
Method kicks off the bootstrap process.
classitems.name: init
